arts.ttl: Shrewsbury live to fight another day after draw with Lincoln
arts.sum: Aaron Pierre cancelled out Shrews old boy Tom Baylissâ€™ opener.

arts.ttl: Michael Appleton set for talks with Shrewsbury Town hierarchy over future
arts.sum: At this point, whether it happens at the LNER Stadium or not, it is a formality that Town will drop out of League One, and Appleton revealed talks will take place on Tuesday next week about which direction they head in next and he is hoping for a 'positive discussion'. "But I think we're due to sit down next week, I think it's Tuesday, to discuss, obviously, what potentially could happen next season.

Lincoln were on course for a rare and impressive away victory at Charlton last weekend, only for a late collapse leading to a 2-2 draw. The Imps are a different animal at home and should win this one...
